name: IlluminaSeqRun
description: Description of an Illumina sequencing run

name.name: Name of the sequencing run, usually 'yymmdd_instrument_number_flowcell'

date.name: Date on which the run was performed

number.name: Number of the sequencing run on the instrument (i.e., run #1, #2, #3, etc., since it was placed in service)

flowcell.name: Identifier of the flow cell used to perform the run

bases.name: Number of bases that the run generated for each read

comments.name: Comments about the quality, etc., of the run
